profile:
At Hometurf Lawn Care, we have been treating the lawns of our loyal customers for over 30 years. As a family-owned and -operated business, we have grown by delivering lush, healthy, green lawns while using only the highest quality products applied by professional lawn care technicians. Let us help you make your lawn look its best this season!

Our season-long lawn care programs take the guess work out of which products to use and when. Applications are scheduled to be applied four to six weeks apart throughout the season for optimal turf care. We strive to ensure everything your lawn needs is included in our programs. No telemarketing or sales calls pushing unnecessary extras.

Our services include: lawn care programs, lawn maintenance programs, fertilizer, weed control, insect control, aeration, grass seeding, dethatching, top dressing, chinch bug control and grub control.

profile:
An owner-operated company since 1983, provides green lawn care services to the Brampton, Milton, Mississauga, Oakville and Burlington areas. At Green Blade Lawn Care, we are committed to providing you with a beautiful, green, weed-free and insect-free lawn. Our guarantee is that we will work with you to create an organic, vibrant, deep-green lawn that will be the envy of all your neighbours. As our slogan promises, “The Grass is Always Greener on the Green Blade Side.”

Whether you are a new or continuing client, when you subscribe to our full year program, our staff is always happy to do touch-ups with our weed control product until you are happy! So, please feel free to talk to our staff, and it will be our pleasure to inform you of your role in helping us cultivate your beautiful, green, healthy lawn. We apply the highest quality fertilizer and weed control products and we provide seasonal aeration. Whenever concerns or questions about your lawn’s health arise, please call us at Green Blade Lawn Care and we’ll be happy to answer questions, diagnose specific problems and provide a solution to your lawn’s specific needs.

Let’s work together!
